channel.title: Promblem
channel.description: Hello this problem i have is where i try to compile sever it says u do not have jdk 6.0 or 5.0 or 4.0 or update 6.0 5.0 4.0 and i found out how to fix but how do i edit my compiler batch do i have to make another file to put it in if not then what some one help me this is what i have to put in my compiler!! how do i put this in??? @echo off COLOR 09 title Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

item.dc:creator: @darkmaster1103 darkmaster1103

@darkmaster1103 wrote:

yes thts what i mean when i try to change it just makes a noise do u kno why i cannot change

item.title: Promblem
item.dc:creator: @darkmaster1103 darkmaster1103
item.description:
@darkmaster1103 wrote:

Hello this problem i have is where i try to compile sever it says u do not have jdk 6.0 or 5.0 or 4.0 or update 6.0 5.0 4.0 and i found out how to fix but how do i edit my compiler batch do i have to make another file to put it in if not then what some one help me this is what i have to put in my compiler!!
how do i put this in???
@echo off
COLOR 09
title Simple Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
